template.subject: Public Records Request - [SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION]
template.body:
To the Public Records Custodian:

Pursuant to the Idaho Public Records Act, Idaho Code § 74-101 et seq., I respectfully request access to the following public records:

[DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS REQUESTED]

This request is made under Idaho Code § 74-102, which provides that every person has a right to examine and take a copy of any public record of this state.

Please provide the records in the following format: [SPECIFY: copies, electronic format, inspection, etc.]

Required Contact Information:
Name: [YOUR FULL NAME]
Address: [YOUR COMPLETE ADDRESS]
Phone: [YOUR PHONE NUMBER]
Email: [YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS]
Preferred delivery method: [EMAIL/MAIL/PICKUP]

I am an Idaho resident and understand this request should receive a response within three (3) working days per Idaho Code § 74-103.

If any portion of this request is exempt from disclosure, please identify the specific statutory exemption and provide any segregable portions that can be released per Idaho Code § 74-112.

If you determine that fees will be charged, please provide an estimate before proceeding and consider whether this request contributes significantly to public understanding of government operations, which may warrant a fee waiver under Idaho Code § 74-102(9)(b).

Please acknowledge receipt of this request and provide the responsive records within the timeframe required by Idaho law.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[DATE]
